## Hls class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default class Hls implements HlsEventEmitter 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [HlsEventEmitter](./hls.js.hlseventemitter.md)

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(userConfig)](./hls.js.hls._constructor_.md) |  | Creates an instance of an HLS client that can attach to exactly one <code>HTMLMediaElement</code>. |

|  [stopLoad()](./hls.js.hls.stopload.md) |  | Stop loading of any stream data. |
|  [swapAudioCodec()](./hls.js.hls.swapaudiocodec.md) |  | Swap through possible audio codecs in the stream (for example to switch from stereo to 5.1) |
